titles.title: To require the Consumer Product Safety Commission to ban toys which in size, shape, or overall appearance resemble real handguns.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection.

bill.summary:
1/11/2007--Introduced.
Directs the Consumer Product Safety Commission to promulgate a rule declaring any toy which resembles a real handgun in size, shape, or overall appearance to be a banned hazardous product under the Consumer Product Safety Act.
